task.summary: Go back to a stable mail version
Fix token accessing to test email samples
Move before_ logic from account activation controller to the user controller (failing before), fix accessed token and fix tests
Add user sign up integration test
Generate PasswordResetsController - rails generate controller PasswordResets new edit --no-test-framework
Implement create_reset_digest and send_password_reset_email on user model and finish password_reset
Add a token on preview to test password reset messages
Define user params on password reset controller
Generate micropost model - rails generate model Micropost content:text user:references
Add composite index on users and created at date on microposts
Add micropost tests and validation to the micropost model
Add relationship between user and posts
Add test to get posts in desc order and model rule
Delete dependent microposts on user destroy
Move logged_in_user from user to app controller
Add stub create and destroy to micropost controller
Add logged in conditional to home page
Add micropost in static pages controller and make error messages partial more generic (take an object)
Adjust partials that use shared error messages and fix syntax
Combine user feed items and user home page
Add micropost interface test and fix micropost view to prevent cross-user micropost deletion
